original_title: The Piano Guys: Live at Red Butte Garden
overview: Filmed at the stunning Red Butte Garden in Utah, Live At Red Butte Garden is an outdoor concert special. The Piano Guys perform many of their most popular hits live including "Titanium/Pavane," "Rolling in the Deep" and "What Makes You Beautiful" along with three additional bonus performances.
tagline: Don't only practice your art, but force your way into its Secrets, for it and knowledge can raise men to the Devine.
title: The Piano Guys: Live at Red Butte Garden
